name: Infinite Survival (itch) (oneWonder)
description:
Right mouse button: Change the view

Left mouse button: Attack

Mouse wheel : Zoom in/out the view

'WASD' : Move

'B' : Open/Close the bag

'C' : Open/Close the crafting table

'Shift' : Consume SP to speed up

'Esc' : Open/Close the Game menu in gmae
